data.name: This Portfolio
data.description: A simple portfolio to showcase some of my work and projects.
data.tools: React Framework, Javascript, Bootstrap, HTML/CSS, Github, Netlify

data.name: Research Paper: Applying Topic Modeling to Massive Open Online Courses
data.description: The scope of this paper is to implement algorithms for topic modeling in the final answers given by students in Greek Massively Open Online Courses (MOOC).
data.tools: Python, MOOC, Tensorflow, Keras, LDA, NNMF, GSDMM, SeaNMF

data.name: FlipYard
data.description: A management tool that helps you maximize your effectiveness when flipping items. Automatically search prices for similar items on eBay.

data.name: Minimal Tips
data.description: An app that provides you with a daily life tip, all you have to do is apply it.

data.description: An app that lets you have your videos ready to be printed and reproduced by scanning the photo with your phone.

data.name: Battery Charge Notification
data.description: A python script that raises notifications based on the laptop's battery percentage in order to reverse the battery health.

data.name: AVL Tree Implementation
data.description: An implementation of the famous self-balancing binary search tree data structure.

data.name: Amazon/Ebay Search & BMI Calculator Plugins on Jarvis Project
data.description: The Amazon/eBay Search plugin allows you to type a term in your console and it will find it on Amazon/eBay. The health plugin can tell you about your Body Mass Index (BMI) and daily caloric intake while also suggesting calories for losing weight and for putting on weight.
